verses.verse: Israel <WH3478> is an empty<WH1238> vine,<WH1612> he bringeth forth<WH7737> fruit<WH6529> unto himself: according to the multitude<WH7230> of his fruit<WH6529> he hath increased<WH7235> the altars;<WH4196> according to the goodness<WH2896> of his land<WH776> they have made goodly<WH3190> images.<WH4676>
Their heart<WH3820> is divided;<WH2505> now<WH6258> shall they be found faulty:<WH816> he<WH1931> shall break down<WH6202> their altars,<WH4196> he shall spoil<WH7703> their images.<WH4676>

For <WH3588> now<WH6258> they shall say,<WH559> We have no<WH369> king,<WH4428> because<WH3588> we feared<WH3372> not<WH3808> <WH853> the LORD;<WH3068> what<WH4100> then should a king<WH4428> do<WH6213> to us?

They have spoken<WH1696> words,<WH1697> swearing<WH422> falsely<WH7723> in making<WH3772> a covenant:<WH1285> thus judgment<WH4941> springeth up<WH6524> as hemlock<WH7219> in<WH5921> the furrows<WH8525> of the field.<WH7704>

The inhabitants<WH7934> of Samaria<WH8111> shall fear<WH1481> because of the calves<WH5697> of Beth-aven:<WH1007> for<WH3588> the people<WH5971> thereof shall mourn<WH56> over<WH5921> it, and the priests<WH3649> thereof that rejoiced<WH1523> on<WH5921> it, for<WH5921> the glory<WH3519> thereof, because<WH3588> it is departed<WH1540> from<WH4480> it.

It shall be also<WH1571> carried<WH2986> unto Assyria<WH804> for a present<WH4503> to king<WH4428> Jareb:<WH3377> Ephraim<WH669> shall receive<WH3947> shame,<WH1317> and Israel<WH3478> shall be ashamed<WH954> of his own counsel.<WH4480> <WH6098>
As for Samaria,<WH8111> her king<WH4428> is cut off<WH1820> as the foam<WH7110> upon<WH5921> <WH6440> the water.<WH4325>

The high places<WH1116> also of Aven,<WH206> the sin<WH2403> of Israel,<WH3478> shall be destroyed:<WH8045> the thorn<WH6975> and the thistle<WH1863> shall come up<WH5927> on<WH5921> their altars;<WH4196> and they shall say<WH559> to the mountains,<WH2022> Cover<WH3680> us; and to the hills,<WH1389> Fall<WH5307> on<WH5921> us.

O Israel,<WH3478> thou hast sinned<WH2398> from the days<WH4480> <WH3117> of Gibeah:<WH1390> there<WH8033> they stood:<WH5975> the battle<WH4421> in Gibeah<WH1390> against<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of iniquity<WH5932> did not<WH3808> overtake<WH5381> them.

It is in my desire<WH185> that I should chastise<WH3256> them; and the people<WH5971> shall be gathered<WH622> against<WH5921> them, when they shall bind<WH631> themselves in their two<WH8147> furrows.<WH5869>

And Ephraim<WH669> is as a heifer<WH5697> that is taught,<WH3925> and loveth<WH157> to tread out<WH1758> the corn; but I<WH589> passed over<WH5674> upon<WH5921> her fair<WH2898> neck:<WH6677> I will make Ephraim<WH669> to ride;<WH7392> Judah<WH3063> shall plow,<WH2790> and Jacob<WH3290> shall break his clods.<WH7702>

Sow <WH2232> to yourselves in righteousness,<WH6666> reap<WH7114> in<WH6310> mercy;<WH2617> break up<WH5214> your fallow ground:<WH5215> for it is time<WH6256> to seek<WH1875> <WH853> the LORD,<WH3068> till<WH5704> he come<WH935> and rain<WH3384> righteousness<WH6664> upon you.

Ye have plowed<WH2790> wickedness,<WH7562> ye have reaped<WH7114> iniquity;<WH5766> ye have eaten<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of lies:<WH3585> because<WH3588> thou didst trust<WH982> in thy way,<WH1870> in the multitude<WH7230> of thy mighty men.<WH1368>

Therefore shall a tumult<WH7588> arise<WH6965> among thy people,<WH5971> and all<WH3605> thy fortresses<WH4013> shall be spoiled,<WH7703> as Shalman<WH8020> spoiled<WH7701> Beth-arbel<WH1009> in the day<WH3117> of battle:<WH4421> the mother<WH517> was dashed in pieces<WH7376> upon<WH5921> her children.<WH1121>

So <WH3602> shall Bethel<WH1008> do<WH6213> unto you because<WH4480> <WH6440> of your great wickedness:<WH7451> <WH7451> in a morning<WH7837> shall the king<WH4428> of Israel<WH3478> utterly be cut off.<WH1820> <WH1820>
